snippet: On his first day back from a mandatory leave for shooting and wounding a knife-wielding man this month, a Kenosha police officer shot and killed an armed suspect, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: On his first day back from a mandatory leave for shooting and wounding a knife-wielding man this month, a Kenosha police officer shot and killed an armed suspect, the authorities said.

headline.main: Wisconsin: After Leave for Shooting, Officer Kills Man
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: After Leave For Shooting, Officer Kills Man
